name: Outworld Destroyer
title: Harbinger
lore: One of a race of fundamental forces, Harbinger's mission is to preserve existence by preventing minds from becoming too powerful.

arcaneOrb.name: Arcane Orb
arcaneOrb.description: Adds extra pure damage based on remaining mana to each attack.

astralImprisonment.name: Astral Imprisonment
astralImprisonment.description: Banishes a target to an astral prison, dealing damage on release.

essenceFlux.name: Essence Flux
essenceFlux.description: Grants a chance to restore a percentage of max mana when casting.

sanitysEclipse.name: Sanity's Eclipse
sanitysEclipse.description: Damages enemies in an area based on the difference in intelligence.
